about.heading: HELLO WORLD!
about.description:
Iâ€™m a resolute Frontend â¤ developer, passionate about creating attractive, functional interfaces focused on user experience. I especially enjoy designing with Tailwind CSS and bringing ideas to life using JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and frameworks like Angular.

I care about visual details, but I also know how to build my own backends when needed, integrating APIs, databases, or custom solutions using Node.js, MongoDB, PHP, or Firebase.

I work in a practical, creative, and autonomous way, aiming to develop modern, responsive websites that are well optimized for search engines. Iâ€™m always learning and exploring new tools that help me deliver results that truly connect.

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.working:
Project under development.

This system aims to optimize management and administrative processes through modern full-stack architecture.
projects.presupuestoWeb:
Proprietary tool by N7Studio.

Online web quote calculator. Estimates web projects prices based on selected options, with integrated PDF generation and email sending with JS + PHP.
projects.galaValencia:
Client Project.

Custom design from scratch. Professional website for events, parties, and venue rentals in Valencia. Includes 3 service sections, image gallery, and contact forms built with PHP + JS.
projects.landingInmo:
Client Project.

Real estate landing page built with WP CMS and styled using CSS and Tailwind CSS. Custom multistep form (no Elementor Pro) optimized for lead generation.
projects.blog:
Blog - News and Technology.

Portfolio extension where I publish articles on technology, combined with the most relevant news extracted from my social media feed.
projects.project:
Format Conversion Tool.

Online tool to convert images, fonts, and videos. Images are converted on the frontend.
The backend can be used locally and is required for video, mp3, and font conversions.
projects.project1:
Integrated Maps.

An interactive map to explore the most important places in Valencia, offers Light/Dark theme and multi-language support. HTML/CSS/JS + Bootstrap
projects.project2:
FrontEnd prototype.

A transfer website in the Valencia area for booking private trips.
Prototype with Angular 17 and Bootstrap
